backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing per‑user rooms, devices, profiles, support tickets, and access control with default room provisioning and helpers for retrieving user-specific maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten file summaries describing major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styles for borders and backgrounds.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with dark mode preset and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling unlock gating, navigation between pages, and rendering AppShell or full-screen 3D view.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LiveSt: Dashboard widget section computing live statistics from device and room queries and rendering energy, health, and activity charts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/widget: Renders a donut-style pie chart using SVG, computing slice geometry and percentages from device category data with an empty-state fallback.
Builds an SVG line and area chart for energy data, calculating scaled coordinates and displaying max values and data points.
Displays a circular gauge showing a 0–100 health value with dynamic color, animated stroke, and status text.
frontend/src/components/effects/GlassCar: Wraps children in a stylized glass card, optionally adding a tilt effect unless disabled.
frontend/src/components/effects/Tilt.tsx: Adds interactive 3D tilt based on cursor position unless reduced-motion is enabled, using RAF for smooth transforms.
Defines the main app layout with a fixed sidebar, header, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Renders the top brand header with styled smart-home solution branding.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Implements the left sidebar navigation with active states, quick actions, and icons using config-driven behavior.
frontend/src/components/rooms/BulkAddDev: Provides a dialog for creating multiple devices at once, validating names, allocating IDs, handling auth errors, and submitting via mutations.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateDevi: Dialog UI for creating a device with validation, auto‑provision retry logic, and automatic device ID assignment.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateRoom: Dialog to create a new room with name/color validation, ID allocation, 100‑room limit checks, and auto‑provision retry handling.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomCountS: A plus/minus numeric stepper enforcing min/max limits for room counts.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDashbo: Dashboard for a room showing devices, stats, and controls for toggling power and brightness with bulk actions and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDevice: Clickable room card showing room info, settings, and device creation controls, with running‑state toggling.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomsEditM: Full-screen overlay for selecting and renaming rooms, using updateRoomSettings to save changes.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomSettin: Dialog to edit room name, color, and hidden state with validation and auto‑provision retry flow.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomsListS: Skeleton UI for the rooms list page, showing placeholder cards and headers during loading.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomTile.t: Displays a room tile with inline editing for name and color, calling updateRoomSettings on save.
frontend/src/components/security/AccessI: Callout for access or provisioning errors with a retry setup button using auto-provision logic.
frontend/src/components/security/Provisi: Glass-style card showing provisioning states like loading or error, with optional retry action.
frontend/src/components/security/QRScann: Dialog that manages camera-based QR scanning, handles results, fallback errors, and camera controls.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Bas: Wrapper component that renders the 3D RealisticHomeModel.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/con: Full-screen touch area enabling camera rotation on mobile while avoiding the joystick zone.
Tracks mouse movement using pointer lock to update camera rotation with clamped vertical look.
Implements mobile touch-drag camera rotation with pitch clamping and touch tracking.
Listens for WASD key events and outputs directional movement state.
On-screen joystick providing normalized movement vectors with deadzone smoothing.
Handles unified camera navigation including WASD, mouse/touch look, joystick movement, room teleportation, and per-room movement bounds.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/dev: Maps device names to 3D positions and provides helpers for querying and filtering mapped devices.
UI dialog for toggling light devices and adjusting brightness with auth‑error handling.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/hot: Clickable animated 3D hotspot orb with hover effects and interaction handling.
Renders hotspots above mapped device positions and triggers device selection when clicked.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/lig: Shows visual light fixture meshes at device positions with emissive brightness tied to device state.
Defines ambient, directional, fill, and device‑driven lighting for the 3D scene.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/map: Defines 2D floorplan regions and zoom transforms for each room.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Rea: Three.js scene defining a detailed interior with walls, floor, furniture, and lighting-ready materials.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/roo: Defines min/max X/Z navigation limits for each room ID.
Specifies spawn positions and yaw rotations for teleporting into each room.
Maps canvas clicks to room IDs based on camera position and triggers onSelectRoom unless disabled.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Roo: Dialog listing rooms and letting the user select one, closing automatically after selection.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Sma: Sidebar showing room device status with master on/off controls and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Vir: Interactive 2D floorplan with zoomable room regions and selection handling.
Error boundary that reports 3D scene rendering errors and suppresses output on failure.
Toggle UI for switching between 2D map and 3D walkthrough modes.
Main 3D scene setup including lighting, navigation, device hotspots, and teleport handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
Auto-runs backend user provisioning once per authenticated session and exposes mutation status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomSidebarActio: Stores and updates a customizable sidebar action in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/clear handlers, and persists identity across reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and room data through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecurityGateway.ts: Manages a local secret key, unlock state, and validation logic via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebGLSupport.ts: Detects WebGL support and reports errors if initialization fails.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes including glass and map styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn helper that merges and deduplicates Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays overall smart‑home statistics, device and room counts, and a 3D navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDetailsPage.tsx: Shows minimal room details with back navigation and error handling for failed room fetches.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Manages room listing with provisioning flow, room count controls, hidden-room toggling, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityGatewayPage.t: Renders the security unlock form with key validation, error display, and QR scan support.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides appearance settings and configuration for a customizable sidebar action, including secret key visibility.
frontend/src/pages/SupportInfoPage.tsx: Implements a support page with searchable knowledge base, form validation, and submission via a support ticket mutation.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualHome3DPage.tsx: Provides a full-screen 2D/3D virtual home viewer with room selection, WebGL readiness checks, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Classifies authorization-related backend errors and returns user-friendly messages and retry guidance.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Adds a timeout wrapper around promises that rejects if the operation exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for fixing room creation to show new room tiles instantly with auto-generated names.
